subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Fredrik Sjostrom scored twice and Martin Hanzal had a goal and three assists Saturday to lead the Phoenix Coyotes to a 4-1 victory over the Devils in Newark.
snippet: Fredrik Sjostrom scored twice and Martin Hanzal had a goal and three assists Saturday to lead the Phoenix Coyotes to a 4-1 victory over the Devils in Newark.
